body:
Comment 5: 
Hummm.. Why it is that way? Why I can reclaim memory from cycles, but can't reclaim,
say, files from cycles? Why do dependencies (and self-dependencies) play any role? If an
object is not references from roots (fintab is not a root), then it can be collected at
any point IMVHO. In the program x/x1/x2 are not references from any roots, so can be
finalized and any point...
